content: the last cluster join in the top of the first cluster slip_stitch to the center of next space chain 1 100 single_crochet * single_crochet in space chain 4 x 5 times 26 20 fp single_crochet fp single_crochet around next decrease 120 spaces chain 4 skip next space* around join slip_stitch in next space chain 1 200 single_crochet * 2 single_crochet in space fp double_crochet chain 3 fp double_crochet --- around next single_crochet x 4 20 fp single_crochet 27 times 200 fp double_crochet single_crochet in next space fp single_crochet around next fp single_crochet single_crochet in next space 100 spaces fp double_crochet chain 3 fp double_crochet --- around next single_crochet* around join cut thread one more time pull the tail end of the yarn to draw up the ring fasten_off all ends using a needle wash and block the finished piece
